page.title: 05Wolsingham Carnival
page.content: {Wolsingham Carnival}is an annual event held on the third Saturday in June.It begins at 1pm with a procession of floats,which passes westward through the town to the main Recreation Field. {Vintage cars}and{vans}take part with drum majorettes in the lead.The first float carries the Carnival Queen. In the field the floats are judged and then the{fancy dress competition is held.A coconut shy,roundabouts and a tombola are among the sideshows. A display unit from the{army}is a usual attraction;the climbing frame which simulates a cliff face is very popular.Later in the day,races and a {donkey derby}are held.A local brass band provides musical entertainment. To raise money for the Carnival,the organising committee hold other events throughout the year,such as barbecues.
